Class CommandLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.swarm.cli.CommandLine

  • public class CommandLine
extends Object
    A parsed command-line.
    Author:
    Bob McWhirter

      • put

        public <T> void put(Option<T> key,
                    T value)
        Put a value under a given key.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value.
        Parameters:
        key - The key.
        value - The value.

      • get

        public <T> T get(Option<T> key)
        Retrieve a value under a given key.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value.
        Parameters:
        key - The key.
        Returns:
        The previously stored value, or the default provided by key if none has been previously stored. The default will then be stored.

      • displayHelp

        public void displayHelp(PrintStream out)
        Display help for the options associated with the creation of this command-line.
        Parameters:
        out - The output stream to display help upon.

                        StageConfig stageConfig)

      • displayVersion

        public void displayVersion(PrintStream out)
        Display the version.
        Parameters:
        out - The output stream to display help upon.

      • applyProperties

        public void applyProperties()
                     throws IOException
        Apply properties to the system properties.

        Applies values stored through the Key.PROPERTIES, Key.PROPERTIES_URL or Key.BIND options.

        Throws:
        IOException - If a URL is attempted to be read and fails.

      • applyConfigurations

        public void applyConfigurations(Container container)
                         throws MalformedURLException
        Apply configuration to the container.

        Applies configuration from Key.SERVER_CONFIG and Key.STAGE_CONFIG.

        Parameters:
        container - The container to configure.
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - If a URL is attempted to be read and fails.

      • apply

        public void apply(Container container)
           throws IOException
        Apply properties and configuration from the parsed commandline to a container.
        Parameters:
        container - The container to apply configuration to.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs resolving any URL.

      • extraArguments

        public List<String> extraArguments()
        Any un-parsed non-option arguments.
        Returns:
        The list of unparsed arguments.

      • extraArgumentsArray

        public String[] extraArgumentsArray()
        Any un-parsed non-option arguments.
        Returns:
        The array of unparsed arguments.

      • invalidArguments

        public List<String> invalidArguments()
        Any invalid options seen during parsing.
        Returns:
        The list of invalid arguments.

      • hasInvalidArguments

        public boolean hasInvalidArguments()
        Determine if any invalid arguments were seen during the parse.
        Returns:
        true if invalidArguments() is not empty, otherwise false.

      • parse

        public static CommandLine parse(String... args)
                         throws Exception
        Parse an array of arguments using the default options.
        Parameters:
        args - The args to parse.
        Returns:
        The parsed CommandLine.
        Throws:
        Exception

        Parse an array of arguments using specific options.
        Parameters:
